com.spotify.android.appremote.api

Interface PlayerApi


  • public interface PlayerApi
    Interact remotely with the Player of the Spotify app. Get an instance of a PlayerApi with SpotifyAppRemote.getPlayerApi().
    See Also:
    SpotifyAppRemote

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  PlayerApi.StreamType
      Available Streamtypes

    • Method Detail

      • play

        CallResult<Empty> play(java.lang.String uri)
        Play the given Spotify uri. Supported uris currently include: Track - example: spotify:track:6rqhFgbbKwnb9MLmUQDhG6 Album - example: spotify:album:2VYSDvc0ZdcfkXDcYVjHs6 Artist - example: spotify:artist:4SJSGUVZ04tezaGrxc96EE Playlist - example: spotify:<user<:playlist::7hJSGUVZ04tevaGixc38EG 
             NOTE Capabilities.canPlayOnDemand must be true to play a Track.
        Introduced in com.spotify.protocol.client.RequiredFeatures#FEATURES_V1
        Parameters:
        uri - to play
        Returns:
        a pending call result that can be used to track the success/failure of this command

      • play

        CallResult<Empty> play(java.lang.String uri,
                       PlayerApi.StreamType streamType)
        Play the given Spotify uri with specific behaviour for that streamtype - such as initiating playback of an URI on the audio stream for alarms.

        Introduced in com.spotify.protocol.client.RequiredFeatures#FEATURES_V3

        Parameters:
        uri - to play
        streamType - Must be one of defined PlayerApi.StreamType
        Returns:
        a pending call result that can be used to track the success/failure of this command

      • queue

        CallResult<Empty> queue(java.lang.String uri)
        Queue the given Spotify uri. Supported uris currently include: Track - example: spotify:track:6rqhFgbbKwnb9MLmUQDhG6
        Parameters:
        uri - to queue
        Returns:
        a pending call result that can be used to track the success/failure of this command

        CallResult<Empty> resume()
        Resume playback if it's currently paused Introduced in com.spotify.protocol.client.RequiredFeatures#FEATURES_V1
        Returns:
        a pending call result that can be used to track the success/failure of this command

      • setPodcastPlaybackSpeed

        CallResult<Empty> setPodcastPlaybackSpeed(PlaybackSpeed.PodcastPlaybackSpeed podcastPlaybackSpeed)
        Set playback speed for Podcast. See PlaybackSpeed Introduced in com.spotify.protocol.client.RequiredFeatures#FEATURES_V3
        Parameters:
        podcastPlaybackSpeed - predefined PlaybackSpeed.PodcastPlaybackSpeed values
        Returns:
        a pending call result that can be used to track the success/failure of this command

      • skipNext

        CallResult<Empty> skipNext()
        Skip to the next track in the currently playing context if there is one. Otherwise pause the context Introduced in com.spotify.protocol.client.RequiredFeatures#FEATURES_V1
        Returns:
        a pending call result that can be used to track the success/failure of this command

      • skipPrevious

        CallResult<Empty> skipPrevious()
        Restart the current track or, if current track has played for less than 3 seconds, skip to the previous track in the currently playing context Introduced in com.spotify.protocol.client.RequiredFeatures#FEATURES_V1
        Returns:
        a pending call result that can be used to track the success/failure of this command

      • skipToIndex

        CallResult<Empty> skipToIndex(java.lang.String uri,
                              int index)
        Skip to track at specified index in album or playlist.

        Introduced in com.spotify.protocol.client.RequiredFeatures#FEATURES_V3

        Parameters:
        uri - of album or playlist to play the track from.
        index - of track to be played. Index can have value 0 or higher. Negative values will be ignored.
        Returns:
        a pending call result that can be used to track the success/failure of this command

      • setShuffle

        CallResult<Empty> setShuffle(boolean enabled)
        Set the shuffle state Introduced in com.spotify.protocol.client.RequiredFeatures#FEATURES_V1
        Parameters:
        enabled - true enables shuffling, false turns it off
        Returns:
        a pending call result that can be used to track the success/failure of this command

        Returns:
        a pending call result that can be used to track the success/failure of this command

        CallResult<Empty> setRepeat(int repeatMode)
        Set repeat mode to repeatMode Introduced in com.spotify.protocol.client.RequiredFeatures#FEATURES_V1
        Parameters:
        repeatMode - Must be one of OFF, ALL or ONE
        Returns:
        a pending call result that can be used to track the success/failure of this command

      • getCrossfadeState

        CallResult<CrossfadeState> getCrossfadeState()
        Returns the state of the audio crossfade setting. It includes whether it's enabled, and if so the crossfade duration.

        Introduced in com.spotify.protocol.client.RequiredFeatures#FEATURES_V3

        Returns:
        The object containing the state of crossfade.
